entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 24.
entry.summary: Showers ending this morning then clearing. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 24. Humidex 25. UV index 9 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
